DROP TABLE DATA_STPIL;

create table DATA_STPIL
Select (ri.KODE_TOKO)KDTK,ro.NAMATOKO,ri.CAT_COD,ri.PRDCD,ra.SINGKATAN,ra.PTAG,(ri.`MAX`+ri.PKM_G)PKM,(ri.QTY)STOCK_QTY,round(ri.QTY*ri.ACOST)STOCK_RP,(ri.STAUT)STO,ri.STO1,ri.STO2,ri.STO3,ri.STO4,ri.STO5,ri.STO6,ri.AQTY,ri.BQTY,ri.CQTY,ri.DQTY,ri.EQTY,ri.FQTY,ri.AHJ,ri.BHJ,ri.CHJ,ri.DHJ,ri.EHJ,ri.FHJ,ri.SPD,ri.ACOST,ri.PRICE,'220603' TGL from st_220603 ri, pr_220603 ra, mstr_toko_today ro where ri.kode_toko=ra.toko and ri.prdcd=ra.prdcd and ri.kode_toko=ro.kodetoko and ri.PRDCD IN ('20043713','20012366','10005482','20057867','20047245','20053796','20071449','20041483','20103178','20103368','10000700','20103440','20073499','20073805','20099414','10000704','10000772','10032795','10005839','20012188','20029782','20010655','20093173','20113566','10000360','20025359','20118832','20079840','10000771','10000133','10000734','10000132','20048546','20049612','20021817','20029237','20096539','20074710','20025096','20080091','20083841','20094096','20094758','20094872','20096159','20102648','20110009','20082197','10013027','20120034','20046980','20097103','20103295','20103296','20063247','20066909','20066910','20094188','20094189','10001014','20113001','20039866','20096538','20118405','20092994','20112001','20115142','20115472','20053378','20094696','20102065','10033815','20054411','10019695','10019696','10013575','20066629','20115331','20115332','10027768','10027952','10000341','10000348','10026500','20100268','10030819','20043818','20040847','10000988','20032999','20105949','20118218','20119650','20119651','20119652','20119653','20012674','20092220','10001782','20112567','20087578','20042518','20059870','20060290','20060291','20073379','20094729','20094745','20114857','20019180','20089821','20102074','20102075','20112752','10000501','20107648','10027672','10015694','20025967','20110266','20110267','20094162','20096975','20071594','20040153','20100033','20121400','20085748','20094308','20103270','20104447','20105064','20105065','20106809','20106810','20107708','20107986','20108548','20108549','20108974','20110283','20111425','20114293','20115487','20119448','20071124','20072917','20079838','20088732','20115198','20112387','20076781','20062625','20122108','20087095','20017746','20059871','20113320','20060288','20112751','10000126','20115486','20116432','20034583','20079732','20115478','20120275','20112366','20112367','20054913','20069699','20068212','20122265','20105402','20107148','20110481','20115481','20115496','20117285','20117286','20121307','20052059','20104405','20104406','20113373','20108609','10003683','20117685','20121056','20122009','20104756','20118534','20120464','20113840','10003074','20121471','20049782','20105336','20105343','20113172','20047849','20077269','20119451','20110304','20112967','20039702','20040928','20108550','20104730','20040927','20040929','20040930','10000798','20113912','20119862','20100807','10033610','20121469','20036593','20077268','20103286','20103287','10000817','10033611','10000801','20047850','20100808','10030397','20103283','20103284','20113537','20120900','20110632','20099095','20103288','20049052','20113115','20109718','20047640','20100799','20100800','20113116','10036778','20047639','20103291','20120913','20113084') ;
